name: UE4 Top Down Shooter
description:
The purpose of this project is to learn how to use Unreal Engine 4 in preparation for our upcoming project.

Game Programming Crew:

Billy Ha How Zheng - Enemy Variants and AI

Chong Chun Zeng - Player Movement and Shooting

Wan Hazwan - Wave Spawning Manager
